item.title: Fossil Rim Wildlife Center - Glen Rose, Texas
item.description: Fossil Rim depends on YOU – our visitors, members, and generous supporters to fuel our critical conservation programs to save threatened and endangered wildlife species and the land they live on.

item.title: News - Fossil Rim Wildlife Center
item.description: Come take a closer look at what goes on behind-the-scenes at Fossil Rim. Get quick access to animal information and blog posts about the conservation work happening daily.

item.title: About Us - Fossil Rim Wildlife Center
item.description: Fossil Rim is a non-profit wildlife conservation facility in Glen Rose, Texas. Learn more about who we are and what we do.

item.title: Tickets - Fossil Rim Wildlife Center
item.description: Purchase your tickets online in advance for an adventure at Fossil Rim Wildlife Center. Pick from private, public and self-guided tours.

item.title: Animals - Fossil Rim Wildlife Center
item.description: Fossil Rim is home to thousands of animals from 50 different species. Visit us and learn more about our conservation mission.

item.title: Directions - Fossil Rim Wildlife Center
item.description: Fossil Rim is just three miles southwest of Glen Rose off U.S. 67. We are an easy drive one hour from Ft. Worth, one-and-a-half hours from Dallas and DFW Airport, and about three hours from Austin.

item.title: Conservation - Fossil Rim Wildlife Center
item.description: Many species you see here at Fossil Rim have fought their way through droughts, an ice age, the shifting of continents and generations of predation, starvation and disease - only to now face the looming threat of extinction.

item.title: Safari Tour Tickets - Fossil Rim Wildlife Center
item.description: Book tickets for a public guided tour at Fossil Rim. Join other guests in a safari vehicle as you learn about our land and animals.

item.title: Self-Drive Tickets - Fossil Rim Wildlife Center
item.description: Book your tickets for a self-guided drive through Fossil Rim. Ride in your own vehicle as you take in the sights and see incredible animals.

item.title: Contact - Fossil Rim Wildlife Center
item.description: Fossil Rim Wildlife Center is a non-profit 501 (c)3 entity, specializing in captiv e breedin g programs for indigenous and exotic endangered and threatened species.
